page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: People in this area have to find their own entertainment because there are no cinemas or theatres.In Bovey Tracey there are a group of majorettes called the Tracey Troopers.The Tracey Troopers go to carnivals and they wear red dresses and white socks.They have got pompoms and batons and they learn to twirl a baton, amongst other things. They practice every Thursday night and every Saturday morning.About 40 children are involved.The youngest child is 5 years old and the oldest is 16 years old. They enter competitions all over England.Other entertainers in Bovey Tracey include the Bovey Players, an amateur dramatic group. Bovey Tracey carnival is very good.Many clubs and organizations in Bovey Tracey enter floats. It's all in aid in charity.
